verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu vaise nija-gaṇa lañā
bhojana karāila sabāke ākaṇṭha pūriyā

synonyms: tabe—at that time; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vaise—sits; nija-gaṇa lañā—with His personal associates; bhojana karāila—fed; sabāke—all of them; ākaṇṭha pūriyā—filling to the neck.
translation: At that time, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sat down with His personal associates and fed everyone of them very sumptuously until they were filled to the necks.
